OOC: I have one word to describe Wildrider..."whoah..." LOL!!

************************

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Wildrider considered the irony of what Dominijoe said, he then too 
burst
> into a large grin, but this one wasnt friendly, or patronizing,
this 
one
> had a sinister look to it, and the twinkle in Wildrider's eye 
followed
> along to give the impression that he wasnt thinking of pleasant 
things.
> On the verge of his cackling laughter he spoke. "I don't know 
Cyclonus,
> your too trusting, but I do know," he broke, to spit a gob of oil
on 
the
> ground, it made a digusting splat. "That the ship will make great 
scrap
> meta'," he pointed his gun threateningly, as his expression
changed, 
"as
> will any Maxis, or Autobrats, ain't that right my Decepticon 
comerades?"
> he asked, thrusting out his fist.
> 
> (you know, to give some knuckle. Wildrider dosent believe in hand
> shakes).


::Domnijoe, Blindchaos::

 Domnijoe turned to Cyclonus. 
    "Full Fledged 'Cons, eh?" She snorted. "I thought I was already 
one. Ah well...I'll do things by your books. If I ain't a 'Con by yer 
standards, then I ain't a 'Con." She pointed to Blindchaos who now 
joined them. "I'm sure my buddy will feel the same way."
     She returned Wildrider's grin, though hers was that of a chronic 
trickster with ideas.... Her mischeviousness was bright in her eyes. 
She eagerly clanged knuckles with him. Domnijoe had a feeling she was 
gonna like this guy, even if his spit was disgusting.
    "The world can always do with more scrap metal" she said, her 
smirk suddenly sly. "and I'm willing to help make it."
    Blindchaos transformed at this point, satisfied that the new 
comers were not a threat. His grin was large, friendly and free. It 
almost oozed it was so disgustingly sweet. 
    "Scrap." He said in a charming voice, "is everywhere. Show me 
where it is and I'll take care of it for you."

************
Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
